context: Hi, have you seen Forrest Gump (1994) ?
I do, I loved him in Cast Away (2000) . Did you see that one?
Yeah, the soccer ball Wilson lol. Did you see him in The Da Vinci Code (2006)
I think I did see that. How about him in The Terminal (2004) ?
I usually love him but I didn't in that. Or in The Circle (2017). It was awful
I didn't see that. He is the highest paid actor in the world I've heard. So good for him. This is really old but Big (1988) is good.
resp: One of his best I think. And you should check out That Thing You Do! It's got a Beatles vibe.
